column5: Although my quest isn't in/about Canada, it is maybe close enough for maximum relevancy - My understanding is that the Baudette Ranch House restaurant has closed. I'll be heading that way in several weeks and will be looking for a good, close breakfast spot. I prefer not to travel too far out of town. Except north! Going to miss those huge pancakes! Thanks, Bill Krejca
Hey Bill, I had not heard that the Ranch House had closed, bummer - thats a tough one for breakfast???
It's been for sale for quite some time, sorry to hear it finally closed. That place ALWAYS seemed busy.
River Bend and Sportsman's have pretty good breakfast. The only problem is it si a little out of the way to get there if you are just driving through. Good Luck!
Not a lot of options if headed through the border?? The resorts on LOW are not on the way, but do have good food. I don't know what is out there in Rainy or shortly after??
Thanks, guys, I'll try a Rainy River post and see what comes up. Bill
